alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 26 at 3:00AM CDT until October 28 at 2:11AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... West Fork Trinity River At Grand Prairie affecting Tarrant and Dallas Counties. Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Dallas. * WHEN...From this morning to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 38.0 feet, Moderate flooding will begin along the river both above and below the Commerce Street bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 25.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 30.0 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this morning to 37.7 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
